name: markdown-it-toc
description: Adds syntax for an automatically generated table of contents to markdown-it markdown parser.

scripts.test: npm run lint; npm run unit
scripts.dist: npm run test-ci; mkdir -p dist; export HEADER="/*! $(npm v . name) $(npm v . version) $(npm v . repository.url) @license $(npm v . license) */"; npm run browserify; npm run uglify
scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Sam Chrisinger
